channel.title: MakeNorth - Meta
channel.description: Crafts, home automation, electrification, and emergency preparedness

item.title: Hello World
item.author: Andrew Dunham
item.description: This is the first post on our new blog. We're just getting this new blog going, so stay tuned for more. This blog supports RSS and Atom feeds, so if you use a feed reader, you can subscribe to make sure you never miss a post.
